message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that I believe would be of great value to you. Considering its worth to both of us, I propose a price of $110 for it. This is a fair deal that allows us both to benefit.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product,  $110 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet you halfway. I propose a price of $100 for the product. This is a fair compromise considering the value we both place on it.
